data.actual_result: The arrow moves a little and gets distorted
data.expected_result: No distortion and presses normally like on 100% zoom
data.short_description: When pressing the buttons (with your mouse) in the keyboard combos modal, some specific keys such as the arrow key get distorted when clicked on 90% zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 90% zoom - Open the keyboard combos - Press with your mouse the arrow keys next to a combo, observe the key when pressed
